body: Abraham, Good question.  If you plug in custom surfaces into the viewFactor component and disjoint them afterwards, you can use the number of faces in the disjointed mesh to separate the results of the microclimate map by zone like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jPkKNYv*PqQN-UFXsl5tSBwSvL4kTnzl1MqihcJ2jRznYuyIrF5kjr3Yr887JoynjUHkUGS9O9hIyzIYWC3Xt9s8psS9U0es/PartitionResultsByZone.JPG) I attached an example file to illustrate this. -Chris
